description: The underlying cause of the issues described arises from the removal of the previous search box experience in the Windows taskbar. This change was introduced in the update referenced by KB-5030300, specifically affecting users of Windows OS build 19045-3516. Users have expressed dissatisfaction with this alteration, as it disrupted their ability to access applications, files, and settings efficiently. The update aims to restore an improved search functionality; however, it implicitly acknowledges the necessity to revert to the previous search experience if preferred. This tension between new features and user preferences highlights the need for careful consideration in user interface changes.
